channel.title: Pk skulls and prayer
channel.description:
I doubt anyone can help me with this...But...
I fixed a few glitched with my PK skulls and prayer. Like it doesn't sink on your head. However, When you're skulled and the prayer is on...the prayer is under the skull, when it should be over. Does anyone have a fix for this? Basically I tried swapping the sprites...But that didn't work so well, maybe I did it wrong.

item.title: Pk skulls and prayer
